slogan.multi: [fr]Squelettes complets SPIP 3 + Z-core[en]Full 'Z like' template for SPIP 3

description.multi: [fr]ZKTX Strap, squelette Bootstrap 3 HTML5 pour SPIP 3 + Z-core. Inspirés de ZPIP & du Z Framework de Cédric Morin (yterium.net) [en]ZKTX Strap: Bootstrap 3 HTML5 skeleton for SPIP 3 + Z-core. Inspired by ZPIP & Z Framework by Cédric Morin (yterium.net)
